document.full_text: rod blagojevich was combative and argumentative when prosecutors in his corruption trial began their long-awaited cross-examination of the former illinois governor on thursday.
document.title: blagojevich combative and argumentative at trial
lines_and_colors: rod blagojevich was combative and argumentative when prosecutors in his corruption trial began their long-awaited cross-examination of the former illinois governor on thursday.
